title: ISic000110. I.Sicily inscription 000110
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]AEDIFIC[---]
2[---]VIVIAN͡IPOTES[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of ILTermini

translation

commentary

As Bivona observes, the quality and size of the inscription, together with the presence of the word 'aedific[--]' makes it relatively certain that this text refers to/ comes from a pblic building or records a work of public construction.

bibliography

  • 28 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Fiorelli NSA 1888 480-481 no.21 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
